name: petrol production, low-sulfur | petrol, low-sulfur | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8532/documentation

Estimation for the conversion of refinery production to low-sulphur petrol with a sulphur content < 50ppm (Today 150ppm). A additional energy use of 6% has been estimated. Data for additional emissions and additional infrastructure were not available.



additional energy use for production, no process specific emissions and material use.
category: C:Manufacturing/19:Manufacture of coke and refined petroleum products/192:Manufacture of refined petroleum products/1920:Manufacture of refined petroleum products

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Time of publications and information in the literature
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Different technologies might be used to reduce the sulphur content, e.g. better catalysts, new hydrodesulphurisation process, higher storage capacities, separate transport systems.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Literature data with calculations based on refinery models.
